txt_en: Life is like a mountain road with a new adventure around every corner.
txt_cn: 人生犹如山间小路，每个转角都有新的奇遇在等着你。

txt_en: The world is my oyster.
Life will find a way.
Hope is faith holding out its hand in the dark.
txt_cn: 希望是黑暗中不灭的信念。

txt_en: Perseverance is the soul of success.
Take some responsibility for once in your life.
I'm the king of the world!
Hard things will happen to us. We'll recover. We'll grow more resilient because of it.
txt_cn: 苦难在所难免，但我们终会重新站起，而变得更加坚强。

txt_en: Be brave enough to be yourself.
I was encouraged by my teachers to explore my curiosity.
txt_cn: 老师赋予我勇气去探索好奇心。

txt_en: Music has charms.
Good things happen to good people.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
txt_cn: 超越恐惧，其他皆不足为惧。

txt_en: Every morning is a miracle.
txt_cn: 每个早晨都是一个奇迹。

txt_en: You can do things that no one else can.
Keep on going.
The full moon means the full attendance of family members.
Love is unpredictable. Love is creative.
txt_cn: 爱情是不可预测的，爱情是富有创造性的。

txt_en: Elegance is a journey.
All of human wisdom can be summed up in these two words: wait and hope.
txt_cn: 人类所有的智慧皆可归结为两个词：等待与希望。
